Rihour Metro Station is 100 m away, Le Nouveau Siècle Convention Centre is a 2-minute walk from the property and Lille Grand Palais is 1.4 km away. The hotel was renovated in 2018. Each air-conditioned guest room is equipped with satellite TV and free WiFi access. The elegant, soundproofed rooms include a minibar and some have tea and coffee making facilities. Staff is available 24 hours a day. An extensive and varied buffet breakfast is served every morning at the Grand Hotel Bellevue - Grand Place. Guests can enjoy cocktails in Le Windsor bar and there are restaurants 50 m away. The historic centre is a 5-minute walk and Lille Flandres Train Station is 900 m away. description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at Hotel Carlton! To save at this property, all you have to do is  . Located in the heart of Lille, 5 minutes walk from the two train stations, Lille Europe and Lille Flandres, the Carlton Hotel offers a breathtaking view of the Opera and the Belfry. Each air-conditioned room is decorated in an elegant and cozy spirit, combining refinement and comfort. Each private bathroom has our unique "Carlton Lille" scented care products. Our rooms are equipped with a Wi-Fi connection, flat screen television, bathrobes, Cuvée "Carlton", safe, minibar stocked with cold drinks, a courtesy tray with Nespresso machine, Dammann tea, mineral water and our selection of "Carlton Lille" chocolates. We offer you our "Carlton" delicacies: dishes designed exclusively with local products by our caterer who offers traditional cuisine with a touch of gastronomy. The Carlton Hotel serves a daily buffet breakfast with fresh fruit and local products. The breakfast area offers a breathtaking view of the Place du Théâtre.
 During the day, you can enjoy a drink at the Saint James bar or enjoy an unforgettable moment at the new bar The View open from 5pm. From bespoke cocktails to generous sharing platters, come and enjoy an intimate and unforgettable moment facing the Opera and the Vieille Bourse. The hotel has a relaxation area with a fitness room and a private sauna. Our wellness area offers massages upon reservation. The Notre-Dame-de-la-Treille cathedral and the Euralille shopping center are just a few steps from the Carlton Hotel. The Zenith of Lille is a 15-minute walk away. The hotel is accessible from the A22 freeway, which provides direct access to Belgium, and from the A1 freeway, which links Lille and Paris. A 24-hour secure private parking lot is available at a rate of EUR 30 per night. Book one of our duo offers for an unforgettable weekend:  - Lille Confidentiel offer / from 285 €* : Your night + 2 "signature" cocktails + 2 gourmet breakfasts + access to the wellness area  - Lille Evasion offer / from 200 €* : Your night + 2 Citypasses + 2 signature beers + 2 gourmet breakfasts + access to the wellness area *This offer is valid only on our Carlton Lille site, subject to availability. Offer cannot be combined with other special offers. Indicative price, which may vary according to the dates of stay.
location: 3 rue Pierre Mauroy, Lille Centre, 59000 Lille, France

hotel_name: Plaza Hotel Capitole Toulouse - Anciennement CROWNE PLAZA
description: Located in Toulouse City Centre, Crowne Plaza Toulouse is a 4-star hotel set 80 m from Théâtre du Capitole Opéra House. It features a fitness centre and an interior courtyard with a fountain and sculptures. Toulouse Stadium is 3 km away. Each soundproofed room includes a flat-screen TV. Some of the classic-style rooms feature views of Place du Capitole. Luxury products are provided in the marble bathrooms. An American breakfast is served every morning. Guests can also enjoy cocktails at the PLAZA bar. Guests can enjoy conversation over freshly prepared tapas at our Bar-restaurant O TLS The Crowne Plaza Toulouse provides wired internet access. Capitole Metro Station is 200 m from this hotel. Toulouse-Blagnac Airport is a 25-minute drive away. Many tourist attractions are within walking distance from the hotel: Saint Sernin Cathderal, Couvent des Jacobins, Musée des Augustins, Garonne river.

Les Toits du Capitole is a spacious and modern loft located in Toulouse, 45 m from Place du Capitole. Free WiFi access is available. The air-conditioned open-plan loft has a bathroom with a bath, clothes dryer and washing machine, and a seating room with a flat-screen TV. The well-equipped kitchen comes with a refrigerator, microwave, oven, hot plates, kitchenware, coffee machine, toaster and dishwasher. The sleeping area has a double bed. Bed linen, towels, ironing facilities and cleaning products are provided. There is a beauty salon and self-service bike hire at the foot of the building. Capitole Metro Stop is 150 m from Les Toits du Capitole and Matabiau Train Station is 1 km away. Toulouse Airport is 10 km away.

Located in the heart of Toulouse, the Hotel Albert 1er is within walking distance of the famous Place du Capitole and other main attractions. An environment friendly hotel, it has received the European Ecolabel. Toulouse Stadium is 5 km away. The rooms are equipped with air-conditioning and free WiFi access. There also offer a TV with international channels and a private bathroom with a shower or bath tub. The breakfast is composed of local and organic produce and consists of bread, seasonal fruit, juice, milk, eggs, cheese, yogurts, cured meat, traditional jams and honey. Soya milk and gluten-free bread are available on request. Room service is also available for breakfast or dinner. The hotel has partnerships with tourist companies, which enables guests to benefit from special offers. The hotel's staff is happy to help you plan a day exploring this historic city centre. Free guidebooks are available at the hotel's reception.
